doc.after: Most cancers are initially recognized either because of the appearance of signs or symptoms or through screening Neither of these lead to a definitive diagnosis which requires the examination of a tissue sample by a pathologist People with suspected cancer are investigated with medical tests These commonly include blood tests X rays CT scans and endoscopy
